title: Christmas Mass Schedule
content: Join us for special Christmas services on December 24th and 25th. Midnight Mass at 12:00 AM.

title: Parish Council Meeting
content: The next parish council meeting is scheduled for January 10th at 7:00 PM in the hall.

title: Youth Group Retreat
content: Sign up for the upcoming youth retreat on January 15th-17th. Contact the youth coordinator for details.
